patterns: When can I register for classes?
responses: Registration for the next semester typically opens in stages: Graduate students can register starting October 31, Seniors on November 2, Juniors on November 3, Sophomores on November 4, and Freshmen on November 7. The add/drop period ends two weeks after classes begin. Check your myIIT portal for your specific registration time.
